description: This is a shell script that serves as a CI entry point for running Flutter analysis and tests within a specific Android app directory. It locates the Flutter app by searching for a pubspec.yaml file with an Android folder, then executes flutter commands for dependency retrieval, analysis, and testing.

methods.name: find_flutter_app_dir
methods.description: Function to locate the Flutter app directory by searching for pubspec.yaml with an Android folder, either using a known path or a fallback search method.
